lore: This creature is extremely intelligent, but despite its fierce appearance, it does not have the unquenchable thirst for blood typical of its species. From a ruined temple, the Devourer watched its allies fight each other. It quickly descended and approached them, avoiding energy rays, spells and stomps. It climbed the Mystical Giant's leg and jumped to its throat, making it howl and stop. The Corox waited cautiously. Then, the Devourer turned to the Observer, who wanted to "tell" them something.
menagerieDialog: (Even while it's not moving, its mere presence is terrifying.)
(Let's face it - there's never a time when this creature will be happy.)
(You can't help but notice that your other creatures are absolutely terrified of this one.)
(This creature's appetite is insatiable. You can't remember the last time you didn't see it devouring a giant chunk of raw, bloody meat.)
(It's sniffing at the air in search of prey. Hopefully, it doesn't find any in your castle.)
name: Carnage Devourer
